thread.title: Louisville accuser: Pitino knew everything

author: Parents sue school over bullied son's suicide
title: Louisville accuser: Pitino knew everything
text:
Louisville accuser: Pitino knew everything FOXSports 18 hrs ago © Bob Donnan-USA TODAY Sports Mar 28, 2014; Indianapolis, IN, USA; Louisville Cardinals head coach Rick Pitino in the first half in the semifinals of the midwest regional of the 2014 NCAA Mens Basketball Championship tournament against the Kentucky Wildcats at Lucas Oil Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Bob Donnan-USA TODAY Sports Katina Powell is the name of the woman accusing the Louisville basketball program of recent allegations. In a news conference Friday, Rick Pitino claimed to have been ignorant to such practice. But Powell isn't buying that story.
"How can it be going on for four years, that many people be involved and that many people see what’s going on and Rick Pitino doesn’t know anything about it? You have players that are very, very loyal to Pitino," Powell said to the Indianapolis Business Journal . "And if they thought anything was wrong or anyone was going to get in trouble, I’m pretty sure they would have gone back to report to Pitino."
AdChoices For the entire transcript of Powell's recent interview, visit the Indianapolis Business Journal.
Go to MSN Home
